specialEffects.name: Halves Poison Damage
specialEffects.desc: Reduces the amount of damage taken from poison by half.

specialEffects.name: Nullifies Poison
specialEffects.desc: Immune to poison.

specialEffects.name: Halves Stun Duration
specialEffects.desc: Reduces the duration of stun by half.

specialEffects.name: Nullifies Stun
specialEffects.desc: Immune to stun.

specialEffects.name: Halves Roar Stun Duration
specialEffects.desc: Reduces the duration of Roar Stun by half.

specialEffects.name: Nullifies Roar Stun
specialEffects.desc: Become immune to Roar Stun.

specialEffects.name: Halves Blind Duration
specialEffects.desc: Reduces duration of blind by half.

specialEffects.name: Nullifies Blind
specialEffects.desc: Immune to blind.

specialEffects.name: Guard Damage Reduction Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: Reduces damage received while guarding by 5%.

specialEffects.name: Guard Damage Reduction Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: Reduces damage received while guarding by 6%.

specialEffects.name: Guard Damage Reduction Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: Reduces damage received while guarding by 7%.

specialEffects.name: Guard Damage Reduction Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: Reduces damage received while guarding by 8%.

specialEffects.name: Guard Damage Reduction Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: Reduces damage received while guarding by 10%.

specialEffects.name: Recover HP When Obtaining Col Lv. 1
specialEffects.desc: Recovers 0.3% of Max HP when obtaining Col.

specialEffects.name: Recover HP When Obtaining Col Lv. 2
specialEffects.desc: Recovers 0.5% of Max HP when obtaining Col.

specialEffects.name: Recover HP When Obtaining Col Lv. 3
specialEffects.desc: Recovers 0.7% of Max HP when obtaining Col.

specialEffects.name: Recover HP When Obtaining Col Lv. 4
specialEffects.desc: Recovers 0.8% of Max HP when obtaining Col.

specialEffects.name: Recover HP When Obtaining Col Lv. 5
specialEffects.desc: Recovers 1% of Max HP when obtaining Col.

specialEffects.name: Instant Skill Cooldown on Combo
specialEffects.desc: Instantly resets the cooldown of a random Advanced Skill upon a 70 hit combo.

specialEffects.name: Flight Gauge Recovery Speed UP
specialEffects.desc: Increases recovery speed of Flight Gauge by 50%.

specialEffects.name: Recover HP on Critical
specialEffects.desc: Recovers HP upon dealing critical damage from an Advanced Skill or Ultimate.

specialEffects.name: Skill Cooldown on Critical
specialEffects.desc: Increases the cooldown speed of a random Advanced Skill upon dealing critical damage.

specialEffects.name: Skill Cooldown on Guarding
specialEffects.desc: Decreases the cooldown time of a random Advanced Skill by 20% upon guarding an attack.

specialEffects.name: Skill Cooldown on Weak Point Attack
specialEffects.desc: Decreases the cooldown time of a random Advanced Skill upon attacking a Weak Spot.

specialEffects.name: Faster Skill Cooldown at Max HP
specialEffects.desc: Increases the cooldown speed of all Advanced Skills by 20% when at Max HP.

specialEffects.name: Melee Attack Damage Absorption
specialEffects.desc: Recovers HP for 0.5% of damage dealt by melee attacks.

specialEffects.name: Chance for Enemies to Drop Healing Items
specialEffects.desc: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop healing items when defeated.

specialEffects.name: Extra Healing Crystals
specialEffects.desc: Increase Healing Crystal charges by 1.

specialEffects.name: Healing Crystal Recovery Amount UP
specialEffects.desc: Increases the recovery amount of Healing Crystals by 50%.

specialEffects.name: Quest Reward Bonus
specialEffects.desc: Receive 1 additional reward upon Quest completion.

specialEffects.name: Unique Skill Charge Speed UP
specialEffects.desc: Unique Skill gauge charges up more easily.
